analysis.key_quote: Turning these positions into at-will positions is a terrible idea that will not serve the efficacy of the positions nor the people who perform them.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of steady processes and performance evaluations, which aligns with merit-based systems and due process protections. It expresses concern that the rule would undermine the effectiveness of government functions, indicating a stance against politicization.
